cast.overview: A graduate student and obsessive runner in New York is drawn into a mysterious plot involving his brother, a member of the secretive Division.
cast.title: Marathon Man

cast.overview: Before the Seavers leave for a family vacation to San Francisco, they drop off their pets -- Chance, an adventurous American bulldog; Shadow, a wise golden retriever; and Sassy, a cautious cat -- at a friend's ranch. But when the animals start to worry that they've been left for good, the three embark together on a treacherous and thrilling journey to find their way back home through the California wilderness.
cast.title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey

details.biography: Mark Lawrence Taylor (born October 25, 1950) is an American actor, known for his roles in such films as Innerspace (1987), Honey, I Shrunk the Kids (1989),  Arachnophobia (1990), and High School Musical 2 (2007), as well as television series such as House Calls (1979), Superman (1988) and The Mask: Animated Series (1995–97).
details.name: Mark L. Taylor
